SUZANNE 10-Toxin Free Nail Polish – Free of the Top Ten Toxins found in conventional nail polish

Please note: Nail Polish cannot be delivered to anywhere outside of the contiguous 48 United States.

While most nail polishes rely on dangerous toxins and unhealthy chemicals for their vibrant colors and luxurious coverage, SUZANNE 10-Toxin Free Nail Polish is made with the highest quality vegan products to produce the safest 10-toxin free nail polish available!

  • Vibrant, richly hued polishes which boast easy, smooth application, long-lasting shine and chip resistant finishes.

10-TOXIN FREE: Free of the Top 10 Toxins Used in Most Nail Polishes and Treatments

Creating a truly organic or toxic-free nail polish is virtually impossible, but for those who still want the glamour of beautiful nails and chip resistant, long lasting color, we’ve developed a formula free of the top 10 toxins used in conventional nail polish. We can’t get rid of all of them, but the worst offenders have been removed from these dreamy shades.

#1 - NO FORMALDEHYDE

#2 - NO TOLUENE

#3 - NO DIBUTYL PHTHALATE (DBT)

#4 - NO FORMALDEHYDE RESIN

#5 - NO CAMPHOR

#6 - NO TRIPHENYL PHOSPHATE (TPHP)

#7 - NO XYLENE

#8 - NO ETHYL TOSYLAMIDE/EPOXY RESIN

#9 - NO PARABENS

#10 - NO GLUTEN

Vibrant, Beautiful, Chip Resistant

    Please Note: Nail Polish cannot be shipped out of the 48 Contiguous United States.

    Apply evenly to nails with brush.

    INGREDIENTS: Butyl acetate, ethyl acetate, nitrocellulose, adipic acid/neopentyl glycol/trimellitic anhydride copolymer, acetyl tributyl citrate, isopropyl alcohol, stearalkonium bentonite, acrylates copolymer, styrene/acrylates copolymer, silica, benzophenone-1, trimethylpentanediyl dibenzoate, dimethicone, trimethsylsiloxysilcate (+/-): titanium dioxide, aluminum powder, d&c red 6, d&c red 7, d&c red 34, yellow 5 lake, bismuth oxychloride, red iron oxide, black iron oxide, black 2, manganese violet, mica.

_source.name: Suzanne Somers' 365 Ways to Change Your Life (Default Title)
_source.description:
This book includes daily messages which are my little inspirations!

  • The wisdom which has helped me on my path to a life that I enjoy to the fullest each and everyday.
  • Read a day at a time, or all in one sitting.
  • This book is a daily reminder to keep our problems in perspective, not to sweat the small stuff, and to be grateful for the simple joys of life.
  • Hardcover: 336 pages
  • Publisher: Crown; 1 edition (November 30, 1999)
  • Language: English

[break]

Editorial Reviews Amazon.com Review TV personality Suzanne Somers offers a book of 365 daily affirmations, designed to create a "shift in thinking." "Holding onto old hurts and programmed ideals creates blockages that prevent change and growth," she writes. "Do you really desire happiness, peace of mind, and serenity? You can have it.... But you have to surrender the old hurts and self-serving thinking." By reading her day-by-day essays, readers will find support in being more honest with oneself, healing relationships, creating tranquility, committing to soul dreams, and listening to intuition. So often people put off bliss and peace, assuming they are gifts for the future, notes Somers. But why wait for our birthrights, when the present is here, right now, just waiting to be appreciated? Somers's heart is in the right place, and although she is more accurately described as a caring celebrity than a disciplined spiritual guru, her legion of fans will find this a tender and meaningful companion to guide them through years ahead.

M-Code: SS3W71499

True Brazilian Activating Serum
Traditional Brazilian straightening treatments use a combination of chemicals to straighten hair, reduce frizz, and provide a silky soft long-lasting texture. These treatments may require a lengthy salon visit, and can be very expensive and some contain formaldehyde. 

True Brazilian provides an at-home salon-style, anti-frizz treatment… with no harmful added chemicals!

5 Star Rated Anti-Aging Moisturizer Loaded with Botanical Active Ingredients for Youthful Skin. Look and feel your best with this superfood treatment moisturizer.

_source.name: Iron Plus (Default Title)
_source.description:
Highly Absorbable Iron Succinylate

Iron supplements are recommended for people with lower than optimal levels of iron in their blood. This is something your doctor usually checks in your annual exam. Low iron levels become more common as people get older. If you are feeling fatigued, ask your doctor if low iron levels could be the problem.

For those who are taking iron supplements to help boost their levels, many people experience stomach issues, such as constipation. This form - Iron Succinylate causes less stomach issues. If you’ve been told you need iron, Iron Succinylate, is much easier on the stomach and it’s highly absorbable.

Combat Stress and Create a Sense of Calm

Many of us are under enormous stress from our active, daily lives. This level of stress is a major factor in creating poor health.

Designed for use during the day - this all natural supplement combats stress without the use of drugs and does not cause drowsiness. 

  • Formulated to help aid in relaxation and calming
  • Formulated to help aids in the balance of stress and sleeplessness
  • Supplement combats stress without the use of drugs
  • Designed for use during the day will not cause drowsiness
  • Helps create a sense of calm focus while under stress
  • Includes L-theanine, the natural amino acid from green tea. Natural Calm Renew has double the potency of most competitive theanine products; studies show greater benefits at this dosage. The Japanese have been using this ingredient for years.
  • L-theanine increases GABA (gamma-aminobutyric acid), a neurotransmitter that induces relaxation and also produces a sense of well-being.
  • Contains Lemon Balm, which helps combat stress and enhance relaxation through specific receptors in the brain.
  • Lemon Balm is native to the Mediterranean, where a calmer lifestyle is embraced, and is clinically proven to help people stay calm in stressful situations.

This product is:

Dairy Free | Soy Free | Gluten Free | Egg Free | Fish Free |Sesame Free | Shellfish Free | Tree Nut Free | Peanut Free

DIRECTIONS:
Includes 30 vegetarian capsules.  Take one (1) capsule once or twice daily (morning and evening), with or without food, or as recommended by a healthcare practitioner.

_source.name: Memory Renew (Default Title)
_source.description:
Supports Healthy Memory, Cognition, and Overall Brain Health

The healthy adult brain is commonly thought to contain as many as 100 billion nerve cells, and you can supercharge their performance with focused nutrition. Memory Renew provides a steady supply of these compounds to support brain health as you age.

SAGE extract for attention and memory
Sage extract is known to promote healthy levels of the essential neurotransmitter acetylcholine and other neurochemicals needed for optimal brain function. It also supports mood and cognitive performance.1,2 Our formula uses a novel type of sage extract which has been clinically studied to encourage healthy brain and cognitive function.

Phosphatidylserine supports optimal brain cell function
Phosphatidylserine, an essential component of healthy cell membranes, is critical to brain metabolism and function, and supports brain-cell-to-brain-cell communication.4,5 It promotes healthy cognitive function, healthy memory, concentration, attention and more.6-10

Ashwagandha for stress and mental performance
The ashwagandha plant (Withania somnifera) is one of the most-studied Indian herbs. Clinical trials indicate that ashwagandha promotes both brain and mood health. It can increase stress resilience promoting calmness and making it easier to handle daily challenges.11-13

Maintain mental focus and boost mood with pregnenolone
The neurohormone pregnenolone helps to maintain healthy youthful cognitive function, attention and memory performance.16-18 In fact, pregnenolone has even been thought of as a neurotransmitter.17 It has also been shown to support healthy, positive mood.19,20

Enhance brain function with Blueberry
Blueberry phytonutrients can help inhibit age-related decline in cognitive and motor function.21,22 Wild blueberry extracts have been shown to inhibit oxidative and inflammatory factors in brain cells to support memory health.23,24

Vinpocetine for cognitive function
Several clinical trials have demonstrated that vinpocetine, an alkaloid derived from the periwinkle plant, can support healthy brain blood flow, memory, concentration and overall cognitive function.25-28

  • Completely Gluten-Free

_source.name: SUZANNE 10‐Toxin Free Nail Polish (Speed Dry)
_source.description:
SUZANNE 10-Toxin Free Nail Polish – Free of the Top Ten Toxins found in conventional nail polish

Please note: Nail Polish cannot be delivered to anywhere outside of the contiguous 48 United States.

While most nail polishes rely on dangerous toxins and unhealthy chemicals for their vibrant colors and luxurious coverage, SUZANNE 10-Toxin Free Nail Polish is made with the highest quality vegan products to produce the safest 10-toxin free nail polish available! 

  • Amazing color, rich coverage & long lasting wear.
  • Vibrant, richly hued polishes which boast easy, smooth application, long-lasting shine and chip resistant finishes.
  • 0.4 oz per bottle.
  • Vegan & cruelty free.
  • Bottles are crafted from Italian glass and feature top-of-the-line brushes, allowing for even strokes and accurate application.
  • Proudly made in the United States
  • Gluten-Free

10-TOXIN FREE: Free of the Top 10 Toxins Used in Most Nail Polishes and Treatments

Creating a truly organic or toxic-free nail polish is virtually impossible, but for those who still want the glamour of beautiful nails and chip resistant, long lasting color, we’ve developed a formula free of the top 10 toxins used in conventional nail polish. We can’t get rid of all of them, but the worst offenders have been removed from these dreamy shades.

#1 - NO FORMALDEHYDE

#2 - NO TOLUENE

#3 - NO DIBUTYL PHTHALATE (DBT)

#4 - NO FORMALDEHYDE RESIN

#5 - NO CAMPHOR

#6 - NO TRIPHENYL PHOSPHATE (TPHP)

#7 - NO XYLENE

#8 - NO ETHYL TOSYLAMIDE/EPOXY RESIN

#9 - NO PARABENS

#10 - NO GLUTEN

Vibrant, Beautiful, Chip Resistant

    Please Note: Nail Polish cannot be shipped out of the 48 Contiguous United States.

    Apply evenly to nails with brush.

    INGREDIENTS: Butyl acetate, ethyl acetate, nitrocellulose, adipic acid/neopentyl glycol/trimellitic anhydride copolymer, acetyl tributyl citrate, isopropyl alcohol, stearalkonium bentonite, acrylates copolymer, styrene/acrylates copolymer, silica, benzophenone-1, trimethylpentanediyl dibenzoate, dimethicone, trimethsylsiloxysilcate (+/-): titanium dioxide, aluminum powder, d&c red 6, d&c red 7, d&c red 34, yellow 5 lake, bismuth oxychloride, red iron oxide, black iron oxide, black 2, manganese violet, mica.

_source.name: SUZANNE Organics Outdoor Body Spray (Default Title)
_source.description:
Enjoy the outdoors without chemicals

The all-natural formula contains Amazonian Andiroba Seed Oil, Peppermint, Lavender and Rosemary. May also be used to soothe the itch from bug bites.


Protect your family and your pets with this Toxic-Free, DEET-Free Outdoor Body Spray.

  • Certified ToxicFree®
  • No synthetic fragrances or chemical emulsifiers
  • No parabens
  • No animal testing
  • Completely Gluten-Free
  • 4 oz.

    • Why you must avoid DEET

    DEET (chemical name N,N-diethyl-meta-toluamide) is used as the active ingredient in many insect repellents.  It is widely used to repel biting pests such as mosquitoes and ticks. In some cases, using DEET products may cause skin rashes. Some persons who used products containing a high concentration of DEET or who were exposed to excessive amounts of DEET have experienced skin rashes, blisters, and skin and mucous membrane irritation.

    Spray onto exposed skin on body then rub in.  Apply to face with hands, avoiding eye area.  Reapply after swimming, sweating, and as needed.  For bug bite relief, spray directly onto bites.

    Made in United States.

    INGREDIENTS: 

    Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Vera) Leaf Juice*, Carapa Guaianensis (Andiroba) Seed Oil, Polyglyceryl-2 Caprate (Plant Polysaccharide)**, Glyceryl Stearate Citrate (and) Polyglyceryl-3 Stearate (and) Hydrogenated (Sunflower) Lecithin**, Mentha Piperita (Peppermint) Oil*, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil*, Cymbopogon Nardus (Citronella) Oil, Nepeta Cataria (Catnip) Oil, Purified Water (Aqua), Mentha Viridis (Spearmint) Leaf Oil*, Hypericum Perforatum Extract (St. John's Wort)*, Thymus Vulgaris (Thyme) Leaf Oil*,  Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Oil, Lysolecithin (and) Sclerotium Gum (and) Xanthan Gum (and) Pullulan, Dead Sea Salt, Citrus Limonium (Lemon) Oil*.

    *Certified Organic . **EcoCert. (1) NOP - NSF Organic Compliant/Ecocert Compliant.

    M-Code: SKBUG1

_source.name: IMMUNE SUPPORT | Vitamin C & Zinc Formula Powder
_source.description:
Support the immune system daily with this powerful blend of the highest quality plant-based ingredients.


SERVING SUGGESTIONS

Stir one 5g scoop (1 teaspoon) into 8 ounces of water or add to your favorite smoothie.

ORGANIC PLANT-BASED • ANTIOXIDANT SUPPORT
PHYTO IMMUNE BOOST • KAKADU PLUM POWDER

We all need our immune systems to fight for us every day. IMMUNE SUPPORT provides a delicious daily step to help support our vital immune system. IMMUNE SUPPORT brings together an abundance of potent plant-based ingredients to support your body’s natural defenses and enhance overall vitality. 

Vitamin C and Zinc: 

• KEY NUTRIENTS FOR IMMUNE SUPPORT

• IMMUNE SUPPORT provides nearly three times your daily allowance of Vitamin C. 

• Kakadu Plum (a flowering plant native to Australia) has a Vitamin C level 100 times greater than oranges! 

• Plus, Sea Buckthorn Berries and Blackcurrant provide additional sources of Vitamin C.

• The bio-available Zinc in IMMUNE SUPPORT is organically bound in sacchromyces cerevisiae yeast, allowing for better absorption than other forms of Zinc. 

Plant-Powered Immune Support:

• Berries, flowers, and roots have been used for centuries to promote health and vitality.

• IMMUNE SUPPORT includes Astragalus, a flowering plant full of potent immune support compounds.

• Honeysuckle Flower and Schisandra Berry are all used in traditional Chinese medicine to support immune function.

• Elderberry, Blackcurrant and Kakadu Plum all help support immunity with high levels of antioxidants. 

Gut-Immunity Connection:

• We all know the importance of a healthy gut, and our gut health is connected to our immune health.

• Jerusalem Artichoke acts as a prebiotic and a source of soluble fiber. Prebiotics are the food for probiotics to help achieve a balance of good/bad bacteria in the gut.

• Ginger, which helps aid digestion and supports immunity, is widely used in traditional healing, from Ayurveda to Chinese medicine.

Use and Taste:

• Just stir into a glass of water, sparkling water or add to a smoothie. It has a pleasant, light berry flavor from its natural ingredients.

Natural Sweetness:

• No refined sugars!

• IMMUNE SUPPORT gets its mild sweetness from plants and berries, like Sea Buckthorn, Elderberry and a touch of Organic Stevia.

 

VITAMIN C & ANTIOXIDANT SUPPORT
Kakadu Plum • New Zealand Blackcurrant

BIOAVAILABLE ZINC
Organically Bound in Saccharomyces Cerevisiae Yeast

PHYTO IMMUNE BOOST
Wildcrafted Sea Buckthorn Berry • Elderberry • Astragalus
Schisandra Berry • Honeysuckle Flower

PREBIOTIC SOLUBLE FIBER
Jerusalem Artichoke

PHYTO HERBAL BLEND
Haritaki • Turmeric • Ginger

INGREDIENTS:
Phyto Blend (Sea Buckthorn Juice Powder, Organic Elderberry Juice Powder*, Organic Astragalus Extract Powder*, Organic Schisandra Berry Extract Powder*, Organic Honeysuckle Flower Extract Powder*), Organic Jerusalem Artichoke Inulin Powder*^+, Organic Blackcurrant Powder*^+, Natural Blueberry Flavor, Lalmin® Zn (Zinc Oxide Powder), Phyto Herbal Blend (Terminalia Chebula Extract Powder, Turmeric Extract Powder, Ginger Extract Powder), Organic Stevia Extract Powder*+, Kakadu Plum Powder*.
*NOP Organic
^EU Certified Organic
+Australian Certified Organic

Liquid Oxygen (1oz)

    • No synthetic fragrances
    • No animal testing
    • Formula uses only pure, organic ingredients
    • Beech Tree Bud Extract supports the skin cells. This organic extract moisturizes the skin and assists in the look of wrinkle reduction by supporting the skin
    • Argan Oil is one of the rarest oils in the world, this desert plant restores moisture so skin can survive dry climates, such as air-conditioning or heating
    • Just as this plant protects itself from the desert heat, the oil from the tree's fruit helps our skin to be protected from the elements.
    • Sea Buckthorn Berry is a rare plant that contains essential fatty acids, Omega 3,6,7 and 9! Our skin loves these essential fatty acids and to find all of these essential fatty acids in one plant is remarkable
    • Completely Gluten-Free

      • Anti-aging: hydrates, revitalizes and rejuvenates
      • Anti-Wrinkle: reduces the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles
      • Anti-Pollution: combats free radicals from environmental stress
      • Helps promote clear, smooth, healthy-looking skin

      • Essential minerals support the appearance of smoother looking skin.

        • Lightweight and creamy
        • 2.5 ounce

        Made in United States.

_source.name: SUZANNE Organics 3-Piece Summer Glow Skincare Kit
_source.description:
An Incredible Trio of Some of Our Most Popular Skincare Items

This value-packed kit includes:

  • SUZANNE Organics Bioactive Moisturizer (1oz)
  • SUZANNE Organics Ageless Serum (1oz)
  • SUZANNE Organics Everyday Facial Cleanser (4oz)

Bioactive Moisturizer: Treat Your Face to Hydrating Superfood Nutrition for your Skin! 

  • Loaded with natural, botanical active ingredients, like CoQ10, Argan Oil, and Sea Buckthorn Berry, for youthful, ageless skin.
  • Bathe your face and neck, morning and night, with the hydrating nutrition found only in this Bioactive Moisturizer.
  • No synthetic fragrances
  • No animal testing
  • Formula uses only pure, organic ingredients
  • Beech Tree Bud Extract supports the skin cells. This organic extract moisturizes the skin and assists in the look of wrinkle reduction by supporting the skin
  • Argan Oil is one of the rarest oils in the world, this desert plant restores moisture so skin can survive dry climates, such as air-conditioning or heating
  • Just as this plant protects itself from the desert heat, the oil from the tree's fruit helps our skin to be protected from the elements.
  • Sea Buckthorn Berry is a rare plant that contains essential fatty acids, Omega 3,6,7 and 9! Our skin loves these essential fatty acids and to find all of these essential fatty acids in one plant is remarkable
  • Completely Gluten-Free

Note: For best results, please use after the Calming Toner, which creates a "liquid highway" in the pores to help the skin more easily accept the Bioactive Moisturizers's nutrients and ingredients.

SUZANNE Organics Everyday Facial Cleanser.  Deep Clean Your Skin Without Robbing It of Natural Moisture with this Organic Cleanser

You definitely don't want to strip your skin of precious moisture! Instead, SUZANNE Organics™ Everyday Cleanser nurtures it with antioxidants while providing thorough cleansing of makeup and environmental dirt.  


Infused with Antioxidants for Anti-Aging Benefits. Gentle Enough to Remove Eye Makeup.

  • Gentle enough to remove eye makeup.
  • Completely Gluten-Free

    Twice daily, morning and night.

_source.name: SUZANNE Organics 3-Piece Tanning Exfoliating Combo
_source.description:
Three All Natural Organic Products That Nurture and Hydrate Your Skin While Giving You a Healthy Gorgeous Tan.

I am beyond thrilled to bring you these incredible products for a golden, sunny look all year long, without the harmful effects of the sun or the use of chemically based tanning products.


Avoid the Harmful Effects of the Sun and Chemically Based Tanning Agents

  • This system actually nurtures and hydrates your skin while giving you a healthy gorgeous tan.
  • SUZANNE Organics™ Golden Tanning Serum includes Monk’s Pepper Berry, a natural tanning activator from French Polynesia, that stimulates melanin production without sunlight, while protecting the skin against UV rays.
  • Activate and prolong your tan, while protecting your skin, all with organic, certified ToxicFree® ingredients. This is a revolution in tanning and skin protection.
  • Completely Gluten-Free

This three piece set includes:

ACAI EXFOLIATING POLISH (8 oz.) – With natural fruit acid complex, crushed acai berries, and jojoba beads, this body exfoliator the SUZANNE Organics™. This exfoliating polish stimulates cell renewal to reveal smooth, supple skin.

GOLDEN TANNING SERUM (4 oz.) – Build a gradual, natural-looking tan that is actually good for your skin! Look like you just came back from the beach, without the damage. Our certified ToxicFree® formula uses only pure, organic ingredients that will have you glowing from the inside out. Using a sugar peptide, this sunless tanner gives you healthy, bronze skin all over. At the cellular level, antioxidant-rich Sea Buckthorn Oil contains a high level of phytosterols beneficial in reducing skin inflammation and regenerating healthy tissue.

HEALTH GLOW BODY LOTION (8 oz.) - This soothing, moisturizing lotion includes natural tanning agents to extend your tan or provide a light tan year round.

Made in the United States

_source.description:
A Thorough Introduction To Our All-Natural, Organic Anti-Aging Skincare Line


SET INCLUDES:
Exfoliating Peach Cleanser (5oz)
Bioactive Moisturizer (1oz)
Calming Toner (4oz) 
Everyday Cleanser (4oz) 

Anti-Aging Eye Cream (0.5 oz)
Ageless Serum (1oz)

This wonderful, all-inclusive skincare set is the perfect way for you to discover (and begin to fall in love with) Suzanne's products. Each one is made with soothing, natural ingredients that aim to keep your skin looking and feeling its best at any age.

BENEFITS: 

Exfoliating Peach Cleanser:
  • Beta-hydroxy acids from organic fruits and green tea gently loosen layers of old skin cells while stimulating new cell turnover.
  • Natural exfoliants from polished peach and apricot grains lift away dead layers, leaving remarkable radiance.
  • Completely Gluten-Free
  • This is a two-step cleanser to clean and then exfoliate.
  • Natural fresh peach essence derived from natural peach.
  • Formula uses only pure, organic ingredients. No animal testing. No synthetic fragrances.
  • Retains moistures while helping unclog pores with a deep cleansing.
  • No harsh acids.
  • No sharp granules.
  • Skin will have a radiant glow from removal of dead skin cells and support of hydration for healthy new skin.
Bioactive Moisturizer:
  • Loaded with natural, botanical active ingredients, like CoQ10, Argan Oil, and Sea Buckthorn Berry, for youthful, ageless skin.
  • Bathe your face and neck, morning and night, with the hydrating nutrition found only in this Bioactive Moisturizer.
  • No synthetic fragrances
  • No animal testing
  • Formula uses only pure, organic ingredients
  • Beech Tree Bud Extract supports the skin cells. This organic extract moisturizes the skin and assists in the look of wrinkle reduction by supporting the skin
  • Argan Oil is one of the rarest oils in the world, this desert plant restores moisture so skin can survive dry climates, such as air-conditioning or heating
  • Just as this plant protects itself from the desert heat, the oil from the tree's fruit helps our skin to be protected from the elements.
  • Sea Buckthorn Berry is a rare plant that contains essential fatty acids, Omega 3,6,7 and 9! Our skin loves these essential fatty acids and to find all of these essential fatty acids in one plant is remarkable
  • Completely Gluten-Free
  • 1 oz.
Calming Toner
  • Soothing agents to balance skin, minimize pores, and reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles.
  • Most importantly, unlike toners with alcohol that close pores, this Calming Toner opens the pores to create a liquid highway to help the skin accept the nutrients in the Ageless Serum and BioaActive Moisturizer.
  • Use throughout the day for a rejuvenating treatment.
  • Formula uses only pure, organic ingredients 
  • Cools and calms. Soothes and cools your skin.
  • No animal testing.
  • No synthetic fragrances. 
  • Alcohol free. Many toners are made of alcohol, which dries the skin. These toners can also irritate the skin. 
  • This toner adds the moisture so the serum and moisturizer can slide right onto the skin. 
  • Includes olive leaf and willow herbs - these organic ingredients moisturize, creating that "liquid highway." 
  • Features Japanese honeysuckle, an all-natural preservative 
  • Loaded with soothing herbs and botanicals to rejuvenate skin throughout the day.
  • Completely Gluten-Free
  • 4 oz.
    Everyday Cleanser
    • You definitely don't want to strip your skin of precious moisture! Instead, SUZANNE Organics™ Everyday Cleanser nurtures it with antioxidants while providing thorough cleansing of makeup and environmental dirt.  
    • Infused with Antioxidants for Anti-Aging Benefits. Gentle Enough to Remove Eye Makeup.
    • Excellent for all skin types, from dry to oily.
    • Gentle enough to remove eye makeup.
    • Completely Gluten-Free
      Anti-Aging Eye Cream:
      • This nutrient-dense formula is loaded with some of the most targeted ingredients, such as Alpine Rose Leaf stem cells and sea algae extracts
      • Diminishes the appearance of wrinkles decreasing the appearance of dark under-eye circles
      • Semi-thick, creamy
      Ageless Serum:
      • This remarkable serum is botanically loaded with nature's most powerful anti-aging ingredients, such as African birch and sea algae, to plump and firm the appearance of the skin, and restore the look of elasticity
      • Lightweight and creamy

      Calming Toner, Everyday Cleanser, Targeted Night Cream, Ageless Serum and Lip Wrinkle Serum are all bottles with pump dispensers and caps. Anti-Aging Eye Cream, Bioactive Moisturizer and Body Butter are all jars with twist-off lids.

      Made in United States.

      HOW TO USE:
      Lip Wrinkle Cream:
      After moisturizer, apply to puppet lines and wrinkles around the lips.

      Bioactive Moisturizer:
      Apply to face and neck after cleanser, toner and serum application.

      Targeted Night Cream:
      Apply to face and neck at night, after cleanser, toner and serum. May also be used on the backs of hands and décolletage.

      Calming Toner:
      After cleansing, mist face and neck with nature's calming ingredients, including willow and olive leaf. Also, a wonderful way to refresh your skin through-out the day. (Residue from olive leaf may naturally collect at bottom of toner. Simply shake periodically to dissolve.)

      Everyday Cleanser:
      Use twice daily. Apply to dry skin, rubbing in circular motion. Wet fingertips and massage to cleanse dirt and make up. Remove with warm washcloth.

      Body Butter:
      Apply liberally to body, hands, and feet as needed.

      Anti-Aging Eye Cream:
      Use twice daily. Apply around delicate eye area. May also be used for lines around the lips.

      Ageless Serum:
      Use twice daily. Apply to face and neck after Calming Toner, before moisturizer.

      INGREDIENTS:
      Please click the links below for ingredient infomation.

      Ageless Serum:

      Purified Water (Aqua), Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Oleosomes (Emulsifier-free Delivery System), Argania Spinosa (Argan) Kernel Oil*, Vegetable Glycerin**, Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Vera) Leaf Juice*, Chrysanthellum Indicum Extract (and) Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Lecithin (and) Carnosine (and) Tocopherol (and) Silybum Marianum (Milk Thistle) Fruit Extract, Epilobium Angustifolium (Canadian Willowherb) Extract, Cetearyl Alcohol (and) Cetyl Palmitate (and) Sorbitan Palmitate (and) Sorbitan Oleate (Olive-derived Biomimetic Emulsifier) , Lactobacillus Ferment (from Cabbage)**, Lactobacillus (and) Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Fruit Extract **, , Sorbitol (and) Yeast Extract , Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Seed Oil, Hydroxyethylcellulose (Plant Thickener), Microcrystalline Cellulose, Phytic Acid (Rice Derived), Avena Sativa (Oat) Kernel Extract (Colloidal Oatmeal Protectant)**, Avena Sativa (Oat) Bran Extract**, Sodium Hyaluronate**,  Rubus Idaeus (Raspberry) Seed Oil, Prunus Persica (Peach) Fruit Extract*, Xanthan Gum**, Ethyl Ascorbic Acid,  Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil (and) Gardenia Taitensis (Tiare) Flower, Allantoin, Panthenol (Vitamin B5), Propandiol (Vegetable Derived) (and) Anogeissus Leiocarpus (African Birch) Extract**.

_source.name: SUZANNE Spot Remover 32oz.
_source.description:
Non-Toxic, Green Organic Cleaning Product Removes Some of the Toughest Stains – Naturally!

Please note, the SUZANNE™ Spot Remover arrives with 3 ounces of concentrated solution. Remove cap and fill with water approximately one inch from the top. Fill slowly to avoid bubbling, which can cause wasteful overflow.

REMOVES TOUGH STAINS

FABRIC SAFE FOR CLOTHES • CARPET • UPHOLSTERY

NO TOXINS • NO CHEMICALS • ECO-FRIENDLY • BIODEGRADABLE


Bio-Based, Non-Toxic Cleaning Product that Dissolves 99% of All Cleaning Challenges.

SUZANNE™ Spot Remover is a completely non-toxic, bio-based cleaner that uses a revolutionary technology to break apart organic matter into particles 40,000 times smaller than a human hair. This dissolves 99% of all cleaning challenges. What’s left is a biodegradable, non-toxic emulsion that washes away with a MSDS rating of "0" hazardous impact on the environment.

  • No chemical exposure for you and your family
  • No hazardous fumes from inhaling mist of spray biodegradable, non-toxic emulsion that washes away with a MSDS rating of "0" hazardous impact on the environment.
  • No chemical exposure for you and your family
  • No hazardous fumes from inhaling mist of spray

TAKES ON TOUGH STAINS INCLUDING:

  • RED WINE
  • SOFT DRINKS
  • DIRT
  • JUICE
  • KETCHUP
  • FOOD
  • COFFEE
  • PET STAINS
  • CAR GREASE
  • GRIME
  • GREASE
  • INDELIBLE INK
  • MAKE-UP
  • MUD
  • AND MORE…

CONTAINS NO:

HARMFUL DETERGENTS • PETROLEUM SOLVENTS AMMONIA • CHLORINE • NITRATES • PHOSPATES CARCINOGENS • SOAP • ANIMAL PRODUCTS • ALCOHOL • SULFATES • PEGS • PARABENS

[break]

AS AN EXTRA PRECAUTION, TEST ON UNSEEN PORTION OF FABRIC.

AVOID DRY CLEAN ONLY FABRICS.

Directions: Container arrives with 3 ounces   of concentrated SUZANNE™ Spot Remover. Remove cap and fill container with water approximately one inch from the top. (Fill slowly to avoid bubbling, which can cause wasteful overflow.) Secure sprayer and gently shake to combine.

  • To remove stains: spray a stream onto the area you want to clean. Gently agitate stain with a clean cloth until stain disappears. Blot or press out remaining solution. Repeat, if necessary.
  • For hard to remove substances, like indelible ink, heavily accumulated grease, or dirty motor oil, repeat process 2-3 times until completely clean. 

Ingredients: Plant Based Extracts (Soy, Corn, Tree Oils), Vegetable Fatty Acids And Water.

keep out of reach of children

made in the USA • no animal testing

M-Code: SKSPOT1299

Nurturing Organic Body Butter Protects with Antioxidants, Coconut Oil, Cupuacu, and Shea Butter.

This luxurious body butter protects and nurtures your skin with abundant antioxidants and rich moisturizers. 


Emulsifier-Free, Gluten-Free, Toxin-Free Skincare That's Good for Your Skin.

  • The emulsifier-free formula, with skin-healing superfoods such as Coconut Oil, Cupuacu and Shea Butter.

  • Skin is renewed to a soft, velvety texture with the deliciously invigorating scent of Peppermint Crème

Apply liberally wherever skin is dry. Glide over skin and rub in lightly. Excessive "rubbing-in" is not necessary as this formula is designed to leave a protective layer while releasing moisture into the skin..

_source.description:
Extraordinary Quality and Taste

Carefully crafted in Modena, Italy, these creamy, velvety balsamic vinegars start with the finest grapes from local Italian vineyards. They are aged to perfection with classic fermentation techniques, then infused with extraordinary flavor profiles.

Gourmet Infusions

WHITE PEACH BALSAMIC VINEGAR

_source.description:
SUZANNE 10-Toxin Free Nail Polish – Free of the Top Ten Toxins found in conventional nail polish

Please note: Nail Polish cannot be delivered to anywhere outside of the contiguous 48 United States.

While most nail polishes rely on dangerous toxins and unhealthy chemicals for their vibrant colors and luxurious coverage, SUZANNE 10-Toxin Free Nail Polish is made with the highest quality vegan products to produce the safest 10-toxin free nail polish available! 

  • Amazing color, rich coverage & long lasting wear.
  • Vibrant, richly hued polishes which boast easy, smooth application, long-lasting shine and chip resistant finishes.
  • 0.4 oz per bottle.
  • Vegan & cruelty free.
  • Bottles are crafted from Italian glass and feature top-of-the-line brushes, allowing for even strokes and accurate application.
  • Proudly made in the United States
  • Gluten-Free

10-TOXIN FREE: Free of the Top 10 Toxins Used in Most Nail Polishes and Treatments

Creating a truly organic or toxic-free nail polish is virtually impossible, but for those who still want the glamour of beautiful nails and chip resistant, long lasting color, we’ve developed a formula free of the top 10 toxins used in conventional nail polish. We can’t get rid of all of them, but the worst offenders have been removed from these dreamy shades.

#1 - NO FORMALDEHYDE

#2 - NO TOLUENE

#3 - NO DIBUTYL PHTHALATE (DBT)

#4 - NO FORMALDEHYDE RESIN

#5 - NO CAMPHOR

#6 - NO TRIPHENYL PHOSPHATE (TPHP)

#7 - NO XYLENE

#8 - NO ETHYL TOSYLAMIDE/EPOXY RESIN

#9 - NO PARABENS

#10 - NO GLUTEN

Vibrant, Beautiful, Chip Resistant

    Please Note: Nail Polish cannot be shipped out of the 48 Contiguous United States.

    Apply evenly to nails with brush.

    INGREDIENTS: Butyl acetate, ethyl acetate, nitrocellulose, adipic acid/neopentyl glycol/trimellitic anhydride copolymer, acetyl tributyl citrate, isopropyl alcohol, stearalkonium bentonite, acrylates copolymer, styrene/acrylates copolymer, silica, benzophenone-1, trimethylpentanediyl dibenzoate, dimethicone, trimethsylsiloxysilcate (+/-): titanium dioxide, aluminum powder, d&c red 6, d&c red 7, d&c red 34, yellow 5 lake, bismuth oxychloride, red iron oxide, black iron oxide, black 2, manganese violet, mica.

_source.description:
SUZANNE 10-Toxin Free Nail Polish – Free of the Top Ten Toxins found in conventional nail polish

Please note: Nail Polish cannot be delivered to anywhere outside of the contiguous 48 United States.

While most nail polishes rely on dangerous toxins and unhealthy chemicals for their vibrant colors and luxurious coverage, SUZANNE 10-Toxin Free Nail Polish is made with the highest quality vegan products to produce the safest 10-toxin free nail polish available! 

  • Amazing color, rich coverage & long lasting wear.
  • Vibrant, richly hued polishes which boast easy, smooth application, long-lasting shine and chip resistant finishes.

  • Bottles are crafted from Italian glass and feature top-of-the-line brushes, allowing for even strokes and accurate application.
  • Proudly made in the United States
  • Gluten-Free

10-TOXIN FREE: Free of the Top 10 Toxins Used in Most Nail Polishes and Treatments

Creating a truly organic or toxic-free nail polish is virtually impossible, but for those who still want the glamour of beautiful nails and chip resistant, long lasting color, we’ve developed a formula free of the top 10 toxins used in conventional nail polish. We can’t get rid of all of them, but the worst offenders have been removed from these dreamy shades.

_source.name: SUZANNE Organics Lemon Verbena Hand Lotion
_source.description:
Unique Botanical Ingredients Revitalize, Rejuvenate, and Hydrate Your Hands with a Silky, Velvet Touch

An 8 ounce bottle of the Lemon Verbena Hand Lotion

This light-weight organic hand lotion formula uses unique botanical ingredients to revitalize, rejuvenate and hydrate with a silky, velvet touch. Natural, essential oils linger on the hands with a hint of the fresh, calming, citrus-scent of Lemon Verbena.


Essential Oils, Coconut Oil, White Tea Leaves - and the Calming Scent of Lemon Verbena

  • Certified ToxicFree®
  • No synthetic fragrances or chemical emulsifiers
  • No parabens
  • No animal testing
  • Made with White Tea Leaf - one of the highest quality tea leaves
  • Coconut oil provides a mild base to soothe hands
  • Natural essential oils refresh with the calming scent of Lemon Verbena
  • Completely Gluten-Free
  • 8 oz.

    • HOW TO USE: 

    Hand Lotion: 
    Apply to hands after washing, or anytime for a calming treat for the hands and the senses.

    Made in United States.

    Camellia Sinensis (White Tea) Leaf Extract*, Purified Water (Aqua), Vegetable Glycerin**, Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Seed Oil, Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Oleosomes, Glyceryl Stearate SE, Cetearyl Alcohol, Crambe Abyssinica (Abyssinian) Seed Oil**, Cetearyl Olivate,  Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil*, Microcrystalline Cellulose, Cellulose Gum, Phytic Acid, Sorbitan Olivate, Sodium Benzoate, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Verbena Officinalis Leaf Extract, Citrus Limonum (Lemon) Oil*, Argania Spinosa (Argan) Kernel Oil*, Potassium Sorbate,  Avena Sativa (Oat) Bran Extract**.

    *Organic    **Ecocert and/or COSMOS approved

_source.name: 5-Piece Hair, Skin & Nail Kit
_source.description:
Value-Packed Glam

Please note: Nail Polish cannot be delivered to anywhere outside of the contiguous 48 United States.

This 5-piece kit includes:

• Hair Skin Nail Renew
• True Brazilian Activating Serum
• Ageless Serum
• 10-Toxin Free Nail Polish - Chalk
• Nail Polish Remover

Hair Skin Nail Renew
Formulated with biotin, Cynatine HNS Plus, bioactive collagen peptides, and silicon, the RestoreLife tablets come in a 30-day supply. 

True Brazilian Activating Serum
Traditional Brazilian straightening treatments use a combination of chemicals to straighten hair, reduce frizz, and provide a silky soft long-lasting texture. These treatments may require a lengthy salon visit, and can be very expensive and some contain formaldehyde. 

True Brazilian provides an at-home salon-style, anti-frizz treatment… with no harmful added chemicals!

  • Begins the True Brazilian salon-like treatment you can do at home.
  • Features Meadowfoam Seed Oil, which has excellent conditioning and moisturizing properties and helps strengthen hair.
  • Absorbs into the hair cuticle and helps address damaged hair.
  • Acts as a shine enhancer while also helping to build body.
  • Abyssianian Seed Oil is an excellent detangler and locks in essential moisture.
  • Abyssianian Seed Oil is a light, non-greasy oil that is easily absorbed.
  • Imparts natural luster to hair.
  • All ingredients Organic and certified ToxicFree®. These actives have not been tested on animals.
  • Completely Gluten-Free

Value-Packed Hair Saving Kit

This 5-piece kit includes:

• SUZANNE Organics Coconut Sweet Almond Volumizing Shampoo
• SUZANNE Organics Coconut Sweet Almond Volumizing Conditioner
• True Brazilian Activating Serum

SUZANNE Organics Coconut Sweet Almond Volumizing Shampoo

  • Aloe Vera – light, hydrating base
  • Coconut Cleansers – mild lathering agents
  • Panthenol B5 – strengthening protein
  • African Baobab Seed – protective moisture barrier  
  • The high performance formula includes nature's powerful nurturing ingredients, including quinoa to help strengthen the hair shaft, and leave it soft, smooth, and silky.
  • Available in the Intoxicating scents of Coconut & Sweet Almond or Wild Orange Peppermint.
  • Completely Gluten-Free
  • No animal testing
  • Formulas designed to cleanse, nurture and hydrate hair
  • No heavy silicones to weigh hair down
  • Improves shine, enhances elasticity
  • Strengthens hair, prevents breakage

  • 8 oz

SUZANNE Organics Coconut Sweet Almond Volumizing Conditioner

  • Squalene – sugar cane stalk, provides moisture, enhances elasticity
  • Aloe Vera – light, hydrating base
  • Panthenol B5 – strengthening protein
  • African Baobab Seed – protective moisture barrier 
  • Brazilian Abyssinian Seed – natural silicone alternative, detangles, smooths fly-aways
  • The high performance formula includes nature's powerful nurturing ingredients, including quinoa to help strengthen the hair shaft, and leave it soft, smooth, and silky.
  • Available in the Intoxicating scents of Coconut & Sweet Almond or Wild Orange Peppermint.
  • Completely Gluten-Free
  • No animal testing.
  • Formulas designed to cleanse, nurture and hydrate hair
  • No heavy silicones to weigh hair down
  • Improves shine, enhances elasticity
  • Strengthens hair, prevents breakage
  • Allows for styling with added lift and fullness

 

True Brazilian Activating Serum
Traditional Brazilian straightening treatments use a combination of chemicals to straighten hair, reduce frizz, and provide a silky soft long-lasting texture. These treatments may require a lengthy salon visit, and can be very expensive and some contain formaldehyde. 

True Brazilian provides an at-home salon-style, anti-frizz treatment… with no harmful added chemicals!

  • Begins the True Brazilian salon-like treatment you can do at home.
  • Features Meadowfoam Seed Oil, which has excellent conditioning and moisturizing properties and helps strengthen hair.
  • Absorbs into the hair cuticle and helps address damaged hair.
  • Acts as a shine enhancer while also helping to build body.
  • Abyssianian Seed Oil is an excellent detangler and locks in essential moisture.
  • Abyssianian Seed Oil is a light, non-greasy oil that is easily absorbed.
  • Imparts natural luster to hair.
  • All ingredients Organic and certified ToxicFree®. These actives have not been tested on animals.
  • Completely Gluten-Free

SUZANNE Organics Rescue Hair Mask

  • This deep conditioning treatment made from organic amino acids helps to repair split ends, improve elasticity, increase hair volume, and reduce frizz.
  • Your locks will look smoother, shinier, and healthier in just one application.
  • Fortifying Amino Acids, Arginine HCI, Serine, and Threonine help increase hair strength to reduce breakage.
  • Enhances the look of hair elasticity. Helps protect hair from harsh salon processes.
  • Helps protects hair from damage caused by chemical treatments, including hair bleaching and coloring.
  • Completely Gluten-Free

SUZANNE Organics Volumizing Hair Elixir

  • This organic elixir is loaded with protein from quinoa and vegetable based amino acids.
  • Improves hair density and strengthens the root to maintain hair volume, even as we age.
  • Creating thick, full hair starts at the scalp.
  • Hydrolyzed Quinoa binds moisture and provides nourishment to skin and hair.
  • Helps make hair look smoother and silkier.
  • Film forming properties help protect hair and skin from mechanical stress.
  • Considered a complete protein, quinoa contains all eight essential amino acids.
  • Panthenol (Vitamin B5) helps protects hair against mechanical damage of breaking and split ends.
  • Helps protects hair from damage caused by chemical treatments, including hair bleaching and coloring.
  • Completely Gluten-Free
  • Natural scents from essentials oils of Coconut.

_source.name: INFUSIO Aromatic Infused Extra-Virgin Olive Oil and Balsamic Vinegar Combo
_source.description:
Hand-Harvested Extraordinary Quality and Taste

We start with the finest hand-harvested olives to create small batches of extra virgin olive oil, then infuse these beautiful oils with aromatic herbs, spices or citrus for a variety of finishing oils that will bring life to salads, vegetables, marinades, pastas, grains, breads, poultry, fish, pork, beef and more.  Layer these sublime oils with Infusio Balsamic Vinegars for extraordinary flavor profiles.

Carefully crafted in Modena, Italy, these creamy, velvety balsamic vinegars start with the finest grapes from local Italian vineyards. They are aged to perfection with classic fermentation techniques, then infused with extraordinary flavor profiles from pomegranate, to vanilla and fig.

Gourmet Infusions

BASIL INFUSED OLIVE OIL
Hand-harvested olives are infused with summer’s bountiful basil for an aromatic herbed olive oil; perfect over heirloom tomatoes with burrata, as a finishing oil for chicken or lamb, or tossed into pasta with pine nuts and pecorino.

MEYER LEMON COLD CRUSHED OLIVE OIL
Hand-harvested olives are crushed with aromatic sweet Meyer Lemons to produce a flavor sensation in this unique olive oil. Drizzle on salads and steamed vegetables, use as a dip for bread or crudite, as a finishing oil for simple pasta with Parmesan, or to bring chicken and fish dishes to new heights. 

TUSCAN HERB INFUSED OLIVE OIL
The tastes of Tuscany - rosemary, basil, and garlic, are infused into this hand-harvested olive oil to create an oil as superior as the art and cuisine of the region. Add a drizzle as a finishing oil over grilled meats or to make a simply sublime salad dressing or bread dip.

POMEGRANATE BALSAMIC VINEGAR
Carefully crafted in Modena, Italy, this creamy, velvety balsamic is infused with the bold flavor of pomegranate for a perfectly balanced combination of tart and sweet. Aged to perfection, this beautiful infused balsamic with fruity notes creates an artisanal finish to salads, vegetables, meats, bread or fruit.

TRADITIONAL BALSAMIC VINEGAR
Carefully crafted in Modena, Italy, this creamy, velvety balsamic starts with the finest grapes from local vineyards. Aged to perfection, the classic fermentation technique creates a complex balsamic with tangy and sweet notes. Drizzle over salads, vegetables, meats, bread or fruit for an artisanal finish.

VANILLA FIG BALSAMIC VINEGAR
Carefully crafted in Modena, Italy, this creamy, velvety balsamic is blended with fig and a touch of vanilla for a decadent flavor sensation. Aged to perfection, this rich balsamic adds depth to grilled fruit, brings a cheese platter to life, and creates an artisanal finish to lamb, pork, and beef.

12.7 ounces
